Smith Hall.name: Smith Hall

access.elevators: two elevators, located in opposite corners of the building
access.entrances: one door open on each side of building, lecture halls have separate outdoor entrances

other: ecogrounds coffee on the first floor
lecture halls have a lot of steps!!

Redding Hall.name: Redding Hall

access.elevators: one elevator at front of building
access.entrances: main entrance (front) always open, back entrance open at the back stairwells

other: gender neutral bathroom available on first floor

Brown Lab.name: Brown Lab

access.entrances: front entrance open but doors are very heavy/uneven and crowded

other: women's & men's bathrooms on opposite side of the building, gender neutral bathroom: ???
people often crowd around the front lobby area of building between classes -- hard to navigate
